message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I believe is worth a lot to the right person. I'm offering it to you for $15000.  Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Bob, I appreciate your interest! While $8000 is lower than I was hoping for, I'm willing to come down to $12000.  That would be a fair compromise for both of us. Let me know if you're interested.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $12000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to meet you halfway at $9500. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
